content: dragonfly socks 3/14/10 12 32 pm dragonfly socks note- the picture shows a short row heel i have included gusset heel instructions with this pattern feel free to substitute a short row heel this pattern has not been test knitted yet please let me know if there are any typos size women s medium made for size 8 1/2-9 feet leg is about 8 around without being stretched or blocked materials cavyshops fingering weight superwash merino yarn 4 ozs us 1 5 2 5mm double pointed needles set of 5 http //cavyshops com/dragonflysocks html page 1 of 3 dragonfly socks 3/14/10 12 32 pm gauge 7 spi in st st without blocking process cast on 60 stitches divide between 4 needles- 15 stitches per needle 2x2 ribbing for 1 inch k 1 row begin dragonfly pattern row 1 k1 yo k4 sl1 k1 psso k1 k2tog k4 yo k1 row 2 and all even row k row 3 k2 yo k3 sl1 k1 psso k1 k2tog k3 yo k2 row 5 k3 yo k2 sl1 k1 psso k1 k2tog k2 yo k3 row 7 k4 yo k1 sl1 k1 psso k1 k2tog k1 yo k4 row 9 k5 yo sl1 k1 psso k1 k2tog yo k5 repeat pattern until leg is desired length- my sock has 5 repeats of the pattern in the leg instructions for gusset heel start heel flap it is done using the stitches on needles 1 and 2 30 stitches row 1 k row 2 sl1 p1 to end row 3 sl1 k to end repeat row 2 and 3 until the heel flap reaches the desired length usually 2 1/2 end at beginning of a k row turn heel row 1 sl1 k16 k2tog k1 turn row 2 sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 k to 1 before gap sl1 k1 psso k1 row 4 sl1 p to 1st before gap p2tog p1 repeat row 3 and 4 until all st are worked 14 st left end with a purl row row 4 pick up gusset with needle 2 knit across heel stitches pick up stitches through slipped stitches on side of heel flap follow dragonfly pattern on needles 3 and 4 pick up the same number of stitches on with needle 1 on the other side of heel flap as well as 9 stitches from needle 2 to make an even number on needles 1 and 2 you should have equal numbers of stitches on needles1 and 2 and 15 stitches each on needles 3 and 4 reduce gusset http //cavyshops com/dragonflysocks html page 2 of 3 dragonfly socks 3/14/10 12 32 pm row 1 needle 2 knit to 3 stitches before the end of needle k2tog k1 needles 3 and 4 continue dragonfly pattern needle 1 k1 sl1 k1 psso k to end row 2 needle 2 k needles 3 and 4 continue dragonfly pattern needle 1 k repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 15 stitches remaining on
